<h1>Badrinath Kedarnath Yatra Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/uttarakhand-tour-packages" title="Uttrakhand Tour Packages">Uttarakhand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>

<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2d1df26cd6_85037131" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/badrinath-kedarnath-tour.jpg" alt="Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Package" title="Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Do Dham Yatra of Kedarnath and Badrinath one of the holiest of all pilgrimages in India. The Yatra will take you across some of the holiest shrines of Lord Vishnu and Lord Shiva that reside in the Himalayas and are associated with important legends and historical encounters. Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Package plays a great role in accomplishing your dream of visiting these holy sites into reality.</p>
<p>People from all over the world make it a point to take this journey at least once in a lifetime to free or liberate themselves from the Karmic cycle of birth and rebirth which is also known as ‘moksha’. This Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Package from Delhi, Chennai, Bangalore, Mumbai, and Ahmedabad of 8 days and 7 nights will be one of the most soul-enriching and rejuvenating journeys.</p>
<p>Visiting these temples on the banks of the holy rivers of Alaknanda and Mandakini gushing through is an experience that everyone should have at least once in their life. Especially if someone is unable to plan a complete Chota Char Dham Yatra then at least they must explore these shrines.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Badrinath Kedarnath Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Delhi – Haridwar</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Your Do Dham Yatra will commence from the time you arrive in New Delhi. Our tour representative will transfer you into your transportation that will drop you off at your first destination in Haridwar which is also known as the ‘gateway to Char Dham’ since all the Char Dham Yatras begin from Rishikesh and Haridwar. This will be a road journey of around 5-6 hours as you have decided to cover Badrinath Kedarnath Yatra by Car.</p>
<p>On arrival in Haridwar, you shall be checked into your hotel or accommodation of your choice. The best thing about our well Badrinath Kedarnath tour package is that you get to select the desired accommodation. If you want then you can also attend the iconic Ganga Aarti at Har Ki Pauri. You shall be staying overnight at the hotel here.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Haridwar – Guptkashi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After a delicious breakfast in the morning, you will be driven to your next destination of Guptkashi which is around 230 kms away from Haridwar. It will be an extremely scenic drive which will be one of the most scenic experiences of your life. You will reach there by lunch or pre-dinner time and will immediately be checked in to your hotel here for an overnight stay.</p>
<p>If there is time for you to explore or if you are not tired much then you can even visit the famous Kashi Vishwanath Mandir here. The best option would be for you to go on a soulful leisurely walk and explore the surroundings nicely. You will be staying at your allotted hotel in Guptkashi.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Guptkashi – Sonprayag – Kedarnath</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning as the sun rises you shall be driven to your next destination for the day to Sonprayag. This is will be a short drive where you will be served lunch in between and will take just half an hour to 45 minutes to cover depending on the traffic. Sonprayag is the starting point for the Kedarnath trek.</p>
<p>From here you will be able to choose to go on foot or hire some alternative method to travel like ponies or Pithu service. On reaching Kedarnath you will be staying in one of the tents or the hall accommodations here. Later completing your day tour of Kedarnath Yatra you can go for a midnight Darshan of Baba Kedar.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Kedarnath – Sonprayag – Rudraprayag</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning, you will be taken for the morning Aarti Darshan of Baba Kedar. The spirituality of this place when paired up with the purity of the morning sun rays is one experience that you need to have as words will not do justice. After this holy Darshan of Baba Kedar, you will be your trek back to the starting point of Sonprayag will begin.</p>
<p>Here you will meet a driver who will then transfer you to your next destination of Rudraprayag which is around 60 kms away. It is one of the holiest meeting points of rivers in Devbhoomi which marks the confluence point of rivers Mandakini and Alaknanda which finally forms the Ganga River from here on.</p>
<p>On reaching Rudraprayag you will be transferred to your allotted choice of accommodation here for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Rudraprayag – Badrinath Dham</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning after breakfast, you will be transferred to your next destination of Badrinath via a car ride. Traveling through the hills guarantees picturesque vistas during your road trip. On your way, you will be made to visit and offer Darshan at Shri Narsingh Temple which is situated in the holy town of Joshimath that lies just before Badri Vishal.</p>
<p>After covering a distance of 158 kms and finally arriving in Badrinath you will be checked into your hotel here for an overnight stay. In the evening after freshening up or if you are in the mood to explore your surroundings you will be taken for a brief sightseeing tour of tourist attractions in Badrinath. This will include Vyas Gufa, Mana Village (3km away), Saraswati River, Bheem Pul, etc.</p>
<p>After completing your Badrinath Yatra if you want then you can attend the evening Aarti procession at Badri Vishal Temple. Later on, you will be made to head back to your accommodation in Badrinath town for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Badrinath – Rudraprayag</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>You will be made to visit the holy Badrinath temple early in the morning to attend the holy Aarti ceremony here. After the completion of your Darshan and puja rituals, you will be driven to your next destination for the day which will be Rudraprayag.</p>
<p>After covering a scenic journey, you will be made to check in to your hotel for an overnight stay. The remainder of the day will be free for you to indulge in some leisurely activities like strolling around the holy village and relaxing amidst its scenic beauty. You shall be staying for the night in Rudraprayag.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Rudraprayag – Rishikesh</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your journey to Rishikesh will begin early in the morning after your breakfast. You will be driven to Rishikesh via a car journey which you will remember for a long time. You will cover a journey of around 133 kms and on arriving at Rishikesh you will be checked into your allotted hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
<p>In the evening you will have a fun time in attending the holy Ganga Aarti at any of the ghats of Rishikesh.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Rishikesh – Delhi Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your journey back home will commence early in the morning from Rishikesh via the road. It will be a trip of around 5-6 hours and you will be dropped off at your departure location at the New Delhi railway station. This final drop-off will mark the end of your Do Dham pilgrimage to Kedarnath and Badrinath.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Badrinath Kedarnath Yatra Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What is the best time to visit Kedarnath and Badrinath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Both these holy shrines are nestled on huge elevations hence, experience inconsistent and extreme climatic conditions. Thus, it is advised to avoid monsoon months for your travel plan and also the shrines are closed during the winter months.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How can I go to Badrinath and Kedarnath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> These places are accessible via all modes of transport and helicopter service is the best and the most convenient way to flock here.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which places are included in Badrinath and Kedarnath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Browsing Kedar Badri tour packages lets you explore enjoy exploring several places including Badrinath Temple, Kedarnath Temple, Guptkashi, Mana Village, Rudraprayag, Sonprayag, etc.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How can I plan a Trip to Kedarnath and Badrinath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Reading out the well narrated Kedarnath and Badrinath travel guides help you plan your trip more easily and make your travel hassle free.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Where should I go first Badrinath or Kedarnath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> One must plan to explore Kedarnath first as it would be easier to move straight for your onward journey.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What is the cost of Do Dham Yatra Package?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Badrinath Kedarnath Yatra Cost depends upon the mode of transportation you are opting for. Check out the below-mentioned rates of Badrinath Kedarnath tour package.</p>
<ul>
<li>Do Dham Tour Package- <strong>INR 20,000/-</strong></li>
<li>Do Dham Yatra by Helicopter- <strong>INR 95,000/-</strong></li>
</ul></div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How long does it take from Kedarnath to Badrinath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> One needs to cover a total distance of 218 km by road which takes almost 5 hrs to reach.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which is higher Kedarnath or Badrinath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Both the holy pilgrimages are different in their own terms and hold great importance, so it can’t be said that which one is higher among them.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
